definitions.body: :Ps 52:10 olive-tree, olive (NH id.; Aram. zayto0, [[זֵיתָא]]; Eth. zayt: Ar. zaytuwnun olive-tree, olive, zaytun olive-oil; v. Lag:M iii. 215 ff Hom:Aufsätze u. Abh., 1892, 94, 99 ff.; √dub.; Thes and most der. fr. assumed [[זהה]] be bright, fresh, luxuriant (v. sub [[זִוּ]]) + [[ת]] afformat. which is. then treated as radical, cf. Sta:§ 187 a; but this not certain, cf. Ol:§ 119 b, 142 a; acc. to Lag:Armen. Stud. § 1347 ´[[ז]] is Armen. loan-word, v. also Lag:M l. c.; BN 219, Anm.);—abs. ´[[ז]] Ge 8:11, cstr. [[זֵית]] De 8:8; 2Ki 18:32; sf. [[זֵיתְךָ]] De 24:20, [[זֵיתֶָךָ]] Ex 23:11, De 28:40; pl. [[זֵיתִים]] De 6:11, etc.;—

olive-tree Ju Jdg 9:8, Jdg 9:9 (personif., in Jotham's fable), Ho 14:7 (sim. of beauty), Job 15:33 = (as casting off its flowers, sim. of wicked man); in 2Sa 15:23 ins. [[אֲשֶׁר]] ´[[הַזּ]] (before [[הַמִּדְבָּר]], read ´[[בַּמּ]]) LXXL Dr; also pl. of two olive-trees Zec 4:3, Zec 4:11; [[רַעֲנׇן]] ´[[ז]] Ps 52:10 fresh, (thriving) olive-tree (sim. of prosperity), so Je 11:16; ´[[עֲלֶה־ז]] Ge 8:11(J) olive-branch, sprig, cf. Ne 8:15 (here + [[עֲלֵי]] [[עֵץ־שֶׁמֶן]], etc.); also pl. [[שְׁתִלֵי זֵיתִים]] Ps 128:3 olive-shoots (sim. of children); [[שִׁבֲּלֵי זֵיתִים]] Zec 4:12 olive-branches (in Zech.'s vision); [[זַיִת]] in representative or coll. sense, = olive-trees, groups of growing olive-trees, as property, source of wealth, olive-yards Ex 23:11 (JE; + [[כֶּרֶם]]), Ju Jdg 15:5 (+ id.); [[עֵץ־הַזַּיִת]] Hag 2:19 (+ [[הַגֶּפֶן וְהַתְּאֵנׇה וְהָרִפּוֹן]]); also in phr. [[כִּחֵשׁ מַעֲשֵׂה־זַיִת]] Hb Hab 3:17 the bearing, yield, of olive-trees (‖[[וּשְׁדֵמוֹר לאׁ־עָשָׂה אׂכֶל]], cf. also [[תְּאֵנׇה]] and [[יְבוּל גֶּפֶן]] v:a); specif. [[זֵית שֶׁמֶן]], oil-yielding olive-trees De 8:8 cf. 2Ki 18:32; ´[[נׁקֶף ז]] striking or beating of olive-trees Is 17:6, Is 24:13 (sim. of desolation at judgment of ´[[י]]), cf. [[תַחְבּׂט]] ´[[כִּ]] [[זֵיתְךָ]] De 24:20; rather more often pl.; Am 4:9 (‖[[גַּנּוֹת]], [[כְּרָמִים]], [[תְּאֵנִים]]), 1Sa 8:14 (‖[[שָׂדוֹת]], [[כְּרָמִים]]), cf. also De 6:11, De 28:40, Jos 24:13, 2Ki 5:26, 1Ch 27:28, Ne 5:11, Ne 9:25.
of fruit of olive-tree, olives: De 28:40 (c. [[שֶׁמֶן]]); [[תִּדְרׂךְ זַיִת]] Mic 6:15 (‖[[שֶׁמֶן]]); also [[שֶׁמֶן זַיִת]] olive-oil Ex 27:20, Ex 30:24 (P) Le 24:2 (H).

in designations of place: [[מַעֲלֵה הַזֵּיתִים]] 2Sa 15:30 the ascent of the olive-trees (LXX e)n th=| a)naba/sei tw=n e)laiw=n = Mount of Olives); [[הַר־הַזֵּיתִים]] Zec 14:4, Zec 14:4 (LXX to\ o)/rov tw)n e)laiw=n); the well-known hill E. of Jerus. (NT usu. as Zec 14:4 LXX, e.g. Mk 13:3; cf. also [[הָהָר]] 1Ki 11:7, Ez 11:33, Ne 8:15; Targum [[טזּר זֵיתַיׇּא]] 2Ki 23:13 cf. 2Sa 15:30, Zec 14:4 etc.; Targum Ct So 8:5 [[טוּר מִשְׁחָא]], and so Talm. etc.)
